CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 2, 1957, page 19, reads: "Among the guests... at the Citizens for Lawrence luncheon at Hotel Webster Hall, Monday, were this group of ladies, seated clockwise: Mmes. Thomas Barton, Leo Anderson, Joseph Givens, Everett Utterback, Homer S. Brown, and K. Leroy Irvis. Mrs. Andrew Vaughn is seated with her back to the camera. - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Women and men seated around round banquet tables, including Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, third from left at head table, and women in center including from left: Mrs. Thomas Barton, Mrs. Leo Anderson, Mrs. Joseph Givens, Bernice Utterback, Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, Katherine Irvis, and Mrs. Andrew Vaughn facing back, gathered for Citizens for Lawrence luncheon in Hotel Webster Hall
